deleteNotebookDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} notebook?
startNotebookDescription: Are you sure you want to start the {{name}} notebook?
stopNotebookDescriptionList1: Computing resources are freed up (you no longer pay for CPUs and GPUs)
stopNotebookDescriptionList2: We back up your Workspace (folder/workspace) securely (10 GiB free, then if you exceed this, itâ€™s charged at the cost of Object Storage).
stopNotebookDescriptionList3: Everything on temporary local storage will be lost.
stopNotebookDescription3: We'll restore your workspace and reallocate computing resources.
stopNotebookConfirmation: Are you sure you want to stop the {{name}} notebook?
restartNotebookDescription: Are you sure you want to restart the notebook {{name}}? Once restarted, it will remain active for an additional 7 consecutive days of operation from the day of the restart.
enableAutoRestartDescription: Are you sure you want to enable automatic restart for the notebook {{name}}? Once this option is enabled, the notebook will automatically restart every 7 consecutive days of operation.
enableAutoRestartToastSuccessDescription: Automatic restart has been enabled for the {{name}} notebook
disableAutoRestartDescription: Are you sure you want to disable automatic restart for the notebook {{name}}? Once this option is disabled, the notebook will no longer automatically restart every 7 consecutive days of operation.
disableAutoRestartToastSuccessDescriptio: Automatic restart has been disabled for the {{name}} notebook
pendingTimeoutHint: The expiration date will be set when the notebook is running.
